title: Representations - Rate of Change - Applied Context

content.question: An amusement park ride reaches a maximum height of <math alttext="40" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>40</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> feet above the ground. The graph shows the height above the ground, in feet, of a passenger on the ride for times <math alttext="0 less than or equal to t, less than or equal to 30" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow></math> seconds. At which of the following points is the height of the passenger above the ground changing the fastest?

topic.text: 4.3: Rates of Change in Applied Contexts Other Than Motion
